org.apache.uima.resource
Class ResourceProcessException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          org.apache.uima.InternationalizedException
              org.apache.uima.UIMAException
                  org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceProcessException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnalysisEngineProcessException, CPMChunkTimeoutException
public class ResourceProcessException
extends UIMAException

Thrown to indicate that a Resource has encountered a problem during its processing.

See Also:
Serialized Form

ResourceProcessException

public ResourceProcessException(String aResourceBundleName,
                                String aMessageKey,
                                Object[] aArguments)
Creates a new exception with a the specified message.

Parameters:
aResourceBundleName - the base name of the resource bundle in which the message for this exception is located.
aMessageKey - an identifier that maps to the message for this exception. The message may contain placeholders for arguments as defined by the MessageFormat class.
aArguments - The arguments to the message. null may be used if the message has no arguments.

ResourceProcessException

                                String aMessageKey,

Creates a new exception with the specified message and cause.

Parameters:
aResourceBundleName - the base name of the resource bundle in which the message for this exception is located.
aMessageKey - an identifier that maps to the message for this exception. The message may contain placeholders for arguments as defined by the MessageFormat class.
aArguments - The arguments to the message. null may be used if the message has no arguments.
aCause - the original exception that caused this exception to be thrown, if any
